title: The Yates Report Isn’t the End. It’s Just the Start.
description: Women’s soccer players tried to raise the alarm about abuse for years. When they say there’s more, people should listen.
dc:creator: Rory Smith
category: United States Women's National Soccer Team
media:description: “Even when you know it,” Megan Rapinoe said of a report about abuse in women’s soccer, “it’s just horrifying over and over to read.”
